apihelp-reviewimagelabels-param-filename: Name of the image (without namespace prefix).
apihelp-reviewimagelabels-param-label: Wikidata ID of the suggested label (with Q prefix).
apihelp-reviewimagelabels-paramvalue-rev: The user was unsure, or aborted the review.
apihelp-reviewimagelabels-example-1: Mark <kbd>Q123</kbd> as a correct suggestion for <kbd>Example.png</kbd>.
apierror-reviewimagelabels-invalidstate: <kbd>$3</kbd> is not a valid action for label <kbd>$2</kbd> of file <kbd>$1</kbd>.
apihelp-query+imagelabels-param-state: Only list labels in these review states
apihelp-query+imagelabels-paramvalue-sta: Labels which have not been reviewed yet.
Labels which have been identified as correct.
Labels which have been identified as incorrect.
Labels which someone tried to identify but gave up.
apihelp-query+unreviewedimagelabels-summ: Show titles with suggested image labels needing review.
apihelp-query+unreviewedimagelabels-para: Only return results uploaded by this user.
Number of result items to return.
